headline.main: BRITISH GUNS PLAY BIG ROLE IN EGYPT; Concentrations of Shellfire Blast Path for Infantry in Desert Advances

lead_paragraph: WITH THE BRITISH EIGHTH ARMY, Oct. 31 (Delayed) -- It is reported that the British Eighth Army has obtained a fair-sized bag this time, mostly German, and that it has inflicted heavy casualties. It is not permitted to say how many of the enemy troops have been taken prisoner or killed or wounded, but the number is gratifying.
abstract: Brit infantry makes wide advances under cover of shellfire
